title: MaturityTypeEnum
description: Represents an enumeration list to identify the Maturity.

oneOf.title: FromIssuance
oneOf.description: Denotes a period from issuance date until now.

oneOf.title: OriginalMaturity
oneOf.description: Denotes a period from issuance until maturity date.

oneOf.title: RemainingMaturity
oneOf.description: Denotes a period from now until maturity date.
